venue.name: Cafe Music at Fairfield University Bookstore - Downtown

item.description:
Hi! This is just to let everyone know that I will be performing at Cafe Music in the Fairfield University Bookstore (Downtown) on Friday, February 15th from 7:00 to 9:00 PM. It is ALWAYS great to have some familiar faces in the crowd - and great to make new friends, too! If you could stop by - even for a little while - it would be greatly appreciated. As this is a public venue, feel free to bring friends, family or co-workers to enjoy the music, etc.    – the more, the merrier! 

Please note that this a loosly organized, informal gathering. 

 

ABOUT Tom Ferrara: Tom is a member of Party Express! and will be your event host. Tom performs a classic selection of acoustic folk and mellow rock that includes a varied mix of artists from James Taylor, Jim Croce and The Beatles to Green Day, Dave Matthews and Collective Soul. Tom has performed at a a number of happy hours, open mic nights, private parties, benefits and festivals. For more, check out Tom at: http://www.facebook.com/TheCaptainRocks. 

ABOUT Cafe Music at the Fairfield University Bookstore - Downtown: Fairfield University Bookstore is the newest bookstore for the greater Fairfield community. The store  feature bestsellers, general interest titles, a large children's section, Vera Bradley® products, gifts, an interactive computer department, Starbucks, and emblematic apparel from the University, Fairfield Prep and area high schools.  A community gathering area on the 2nd floor offers a variety of programs. You can find out more about Cafe Music at the Fairfield University Bookstore by visiting their website at:http://www.bkstr.com/Home/10001-232905-1?demoKey=d of at the Fairfield Patch website at: http://fairfield.patch.com/listings/fairfield-university-bookstore-8d86b025.
item.how_to_find_us: Front of the store in the coffe shop area

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: An Evening of Acoustic Music at the Bookstore
